name: Collective Card Game (Closed Alpha)
description:
Collective is a card game where anyone can create cards.
Gather weapons and warriors from the community's imagination in the first strategy card game designed by its players. Create any card you can imagine, and The Collective decides what will show up on the battlefield. Test your skills (not your wallet) in the game that is never beaten, never solved.
Collective card game is on a closed alpha. To download, go to https://alecb.itch.io/collective, and launch "Collective.exe".
Because this game is only on closed alpha, only user that has been sent an invite code is able to login into the game.
To register for an invite code, visit collective.gg.

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P_CrsK9MfvY
Twitter: https://twitter.com/collectivecg
Reddit: /r/collectivecg
